item.title: Special Presentation: Cascadia + DIANE perform in studio
item.description: two of my fave yvr bands perform LIVE in studio xo

item.title: Special Presentation: Cascadia + DIANE perform in studio
item.description: two of my fave yvr bands perform LIVE in studio xo

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Dec-2012
item.description: all island tracks. my faves include freak heat waves, iceberg ferg, daddy's hands and open relationship
item.itunes:subtitle: Vvvvvvvvvictoria

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Dec-2012
item.description: featuring all sorts of shindiggity goodness + a short interview with Prophacy Sun of Tyranahorse
item.itunes:subtitle: SHiNDiG SPeCiaL

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Nov-2012
item.description: Lots of swell sounds from our beloved maritime provinces, including 90s alt classics (Inbreds / eric's trip), diy grunglies of today (old and weird / yellowteeth), and folk-pop gems like shotgun jimmie in between!
item.itunes:subtitle: COOL TRAX FROM THE EAST COAST

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Nov-2012
item.description: Miss Kim and I reflect on recent gigs and talk about what's coming up! We interview the wonderfully weird winnipegger J. Riley Hill about his new album! wwooohoohoho bark
item.itunes:subtitle: LOCAL SHOWS + J. RILEY HILL

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Nov-2012
item.description: Miss Kim and Selina C play ONLY trax released on 7". ALL LOCAL. except for the last song!!
item.itunes:subtitle: 7" MaNiA

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Oct-2012
item.description: Selina plays some of her favs including simply saucer, slim twig, caymans, and reverter! Concludes with a single track picked by Evan!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cool Jams, No Theme

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Oct-2012
item.description: Evan and Selina bring you new mellowish jams of the folk//rock//mariarchi (?) variety. Starting on the East Coast, we've got a song from each and every province (including the territories!!)!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Roadtrippin'!

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Oct-2012
item.description: Touring bands and new releases from coast to coast! Lots of local bands. Guest host Miss Kim Glennie!
item.itunes:subtitle: Touring Bands and New Releases! Math-y rock-y yeaaaaaa braaaaa

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Oct-2012
item.description: All local tunes featuring horses, a mountain range, poppies and drugs.
item.itunes:subtitle: Local Name Game!

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Oct-2012
item.description: I'm going home to prairies for Thanksgiving. This episode is dedicated to musicians based in WINNIPEG MANITOBA.
item.itunes:subtitle: Winterpeg!
